sentences.en: At that time, complete emancipation of women had not worked out in actual practice.
sentences.cn: 那时候, 妇女的彻底解放在实践上还做不到.

sentences.en: He believes very strongly in female emancipation.
He dedicated his life to the emancipation of all mankind.
sentences.cn: 他献身于全人类的解放.

sentences.en: He touched on the question of the emancipation of women.
sentences.cn: 他简略地谈了妇女解放问题.

sentences.en: He was for emancipation by stages and with compensation.
sentences.cn: 他赞成逐步解放,采取补偿的办法.

sentences.en: In order to get rid of these agonies, and eventually to win human emancipation in the real sense, all the people should unite and strive to create a society characterized by harmony of the two sexes.
sentences.cn: 为了摆脱这些不幸与痛苦，也为了人类最终获得真正意义上的解放，共同生活在这一片蓝天下的人们应该团结起来，努力创造一个两性和谐的社会。

sentences.en: Its aim is to help the proletariat in its struggle for emancipation.
sentences.cn: 他的目的是帮助无产阶级争取解放.

sentences.en: Once before, a generation ago, world conditions had given women the chance for emancipation.
sentences.cn: 在过去, 一代人以前, 世界形势曾经给妇女获得解放的机会.

sentences.en: She showed her emancipation by drinking beer and piloting an aircraft.
sentences.cn: 她藉喝啤酒,驾驶飞机来表示她开通.

sentences.en: She showed her emancipation by piloting an aircraft.
sentences.cn: 她用驾驶飞机来表示她的解放.

sentences.en: She spoke of the emancipation of women.
The emancipation of the serfs is a great event in history.
sentences.cn: 解放农奴在历史上是一件大事.

sentences.en: The essence of wisdom is emancipation, as far as possible, from the tyranny of the here and now.
sentences.cn: 智慧的本质在于尽一切可能从“这里”和“现在”构成的暴政中解放出来。

sentences.en: The world identifies Lincoln with emancipation.
sentences.cn: 全世界把林肯与解放黑奴联系在一起.

sentences.en: Their aim is to help the working people in their struggle for emancipation.
sentences.cn: 他们的目的是帮助劳动人民争取解放.

sentences.en: They rejoiced over their own emancipation.
sentences.cn: 他们为自己的解放感到欢欣鼓舞.

sentences.en: We must arouse them to fight for their own emancipation.
sentences.cn: 我们必须唤起他们为其自身的解放而斗争.

words.tran_cn: 解放主义者；解放论的人
解放；使…获得自由（emancipate的过去分词）
